meanings.definition: Fond of giving people orders; domineering.
meanings.sent1: She is so bossy, always telling everyone what to do.
meanings.sent2: The bossy girl at school always wants things her way.
meanings.sent3: The bossy cat demanded to be fed right meow!
meanings.sent4: Her bossy attitude towered over the group like a strict teacher.
meanings.sent5: The bossy clouds commanded the sky, blocking out the sun.

meanings.definition: A person who gives orders in a domineering manner.
meanings.sent1: The bossy in the office always micromanages everyone's tasks.
meanings.sent2: My little sister can be a bossy when she wants something done her way.
meanings.sent3: The bossy of the playground declared himself king of the swings.
meanings.sent4: The bossy of the group ruled with an iron fist, making all the decisions.
meanings.sent5: The bossy of the team barked orders like a drill sergeant.
